title: Mining Engineer
description: Responsible for planning and supervising mining operations.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Mining Engineering, 3+ years of experience, Proficiency in mining software

title: Geologist
description: Analyze geological data to assist in mining operations.
requirements: Degree in Geology, 5+ years of experience, Experience with GIS software

title: Heavy Equipment Operator
description: Operate heavy mining machinery for excavation.
requirements: Valid Heavy Machinery License, 2+ years of experience, Knowledge of safety regulations

title: Tour Guide
description: Guide tourists through historical and cultural attractions.
requirements: Fluent in English and local languages, Knowledge of local history, Excellent communication skills

title: Hotel Manager
description: Manage daily hotel operations and customer service.
requirements: Hospitality degree, 5+ years experience, Leadership skills

title: Event Coordinator
description: Plan and coordinate events for tourists and corporate clients.
requirements: Experience in event planning, Strong organizational skills, Ability to multitask

title: Factory Supervisor
description: Oversee production lines and ensure quality standards.
requirements: 3+ years in manufacturing, Leadership experience, Technical knowledge of production

title: Quality Control Inspector
description: Inspect and ensure high-quality standards in production.
requirements: Attention to detail, 2+ years in QC, Experience with inspection tools

title: Production Engineer
requirements: Engineering degree, Experience in lean manufacturing, Problem-solving skills
